title: LLVM+flang build failures
body:
*Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.

Building LLVM with all variants off except all_targets, clang, and flang as a part of a Spack Stacks build using LLVM+flang as one of the compilers in the matrix (as OpenMPI requires a Fortran compiler).

### Steps to reproduce the issue
Concretized spec is below.

```console
   "llvm": {
    "version": "9.0.0",
    "arch": {
     "platform": "linux",
     "platform_os": "rhel7",
     "target": {
      "name": "broadwell",
      "vendor": "GenuineIntel",
      "features": [
       "adx",
       "aes",
       "avx",
       "avx2",
       "bmi1",
       "bmi2",
       "f16c",
       "fma",
       "mmx",
       "movbe",
       "pclmulqdq",
       "popcnt",
       "rdrand",
       "rdseed",
       "sse",
       "sse2",
       "sse4_1",
       "sse4_2",
       "ssse3"
      ],
      "generation": 0,
      "parents": [
       "haswell"
      ]
     }
    },
    "compiler": {
     "name": "gcc",
     "version": "7.4.0"
    },
    "namespace": "builtin",
    "parameters": {
     "all_targets": true,
     "build_type": "Release",
     "clang": true,
     "compiler-rt": false,
     "flang": true,
     "gold": false,
     "internal_unwind": false,
     "libcxx": false,
     "link_dylib": false,
     "lld": false,
     "lldb": false,
     "omp_tsan": false,
     "polly": false,
     "python": false,
     "shared_libs": false,
     "cflags": [],
     "cppflags": [],
     "cxxflags": [],
     "fflags": [],
     "ldflags": [],
     "ldlibs": []
    },
    "dependencies": {
     "cmake": {
      "hash": "7q3ak7ldgtngareupvf5v633sdezlcpy",
      "type": [
       "build"
      ]
     },
     "python": {
      "hash": "pk6opx7axrbwwb4w5j43tpgjgil3iyjr",
      "type": [
       "build"
      ]
     }
    },
    "hash": "xko4qdc2rtwv5phvexfepzie3ljwcy3a"
   }
...
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. Run on an x86_64 TOSS machine at LANL.
 2. The only external package for this build should be slurm.  GCC-7.4.0 is externally installed as well.
 3. The spack commit used is 307b4bd06cec72aa6bb90c447e21766a537a8d2a.

-----

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively!

If you want to ask a question about the tool (how to use it, what it can currently do, etc.), try the `#general` channel on our Slack first. We have a welcoming community and chances are you'll get your reply faster and without opening an issue.

Other than that, thanks for taking the time to contribute to Spack!
